content: प्रोक्षणं {@--1@} Sprinkling, sprinkling with water; <ls>Ms. 5. 118</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 184.</ls> {@--2@} Consecration by sprinkling. {@--3@} Immolation (of animals) at a sacrifice. {@--4@} A text to be repeated at an animal-sacrifice. --णी, --प्रोक्षणिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} Water used for sprinkling or consecrating, holy water (used in <ab>pl.</ab>, and sometimes used to denote ‘the vessel containing holy water,’ in which sense the word generally used is प्रोक्षणीपात्र).
